All Classes

  • Class Description
    AI
    A class that contains the algorithm for the Computer player in the game.
    Board  
    Controller
    This class represents the controller of the Connect 4 game and allows for interaction from the view to the model.
    Game
    This class represents the logic of the Connect 4 game.
    GameController
    This class represents the game controller of the Connect 4 application and allows for interaction from the game view to the game.
    GameView
    The class of the Game preferences menu and the Connect 4 game.
    Gui
    This class is used to link the model, controller, and view of the application.
    Main
    This class is main class that is used to launch the Connect 4 application.
    MenuView
    The class of the Main menu when starting the application.
    Model
    A abstract class used to implement the ModelEvent and ModelListener classes into the model.
    ModelEvent
    A class that is used to notify the view(ModelListener) when a disc has been placed in the grid in the Game, or to send a message to the view.
    ModelListener
    A interface used to recieve messages from the model by the ModelEvent class.
    ViewHandler
    A class used by the view package to send requests to the controller to interact with the model.
    Window
    An interface to be used for the implementation of a new Stage.
